name: chicagotribune
text: A severe thunderstorm warning has been issued for parts of Cook and DuPage counties until 7:30 p.m. Intense downpours with a "lot of lightning" are expected. https://t.co/jcv9f2c9yX

name: chicagotribune
text: Update: A severe thunderstorm warning has also been issued for parts of Kane, Kendall and DeKalb counties until 7:45 p.m. https://t.co/SGipFr3HFt

name: chicagotribune
text: This remodeled 3-story penthouse loft in River North has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a rooftop deck. Take a look inside. https://t.co/ptfJuvnk8k

name: chicagotribune
text:
A local family bought all the paletas in Don Rosario's cart to allow him to spend Father's Day with his family. They also raised nearly $40,000 for a retirement fund.

Overcome with emotion, the 70-year-old told the Tribune what the gift means to him. https://t.co/2q8civz3Kc

name: chicagotribune
text:
“In this moment of reckoning, we should appreciate what racial souvenirs tell us about how far we have come, so we have a better idea of where we’re going.”

Columnist @cptime on the history told by the racist souvenirs he amassed over the years: https://t.co/eD9MTUo5wb

name: chicagotribune
text: Thirty-five years after moving to Chicago to work at the Tribune, columnist @MarySchmich reflects on what she's come to understand about the city. https://t.co/zSCpxnqQ5I
